product_name: Leki Trail Trekking Poles - Pair - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Make hiking and backpacking easier on your knees. These lightweight trekking poles adjust to the terrain you're hiking and offer Round Top Comfort Soft grips for comfortable handling.
